item.title: compile.48
item.description: build number: 48 re-implement command docker pull elonh/opde:sdk docker run -it --rm elonh/opde:sdk zsh # or bash export http_proxy= # [your proxy], do not use localhost or 127.0.0.1 export https_proxy=$http_proxy opde feeds && opde config -a make package/feeds/base/openwrt-dnsforwarder/compile -j$(nproc) || make package/feeds/base/openwrt-dnsforwarder/compile V=s Compile.txt openwrt-dnsforwarder-6.tar.xz: Download from https://github.com/holmium/dnsforwarder.git failed openwrt-dnsforwarder-6.tar.xz: Requires sha256sum for verification Checking out files from the git repository... Cloning into 'openwrt-dnsforwarder-6'... remote: Repository not found. fatal: Authentication failed for 'https://github.
